overview: It's very easy to work up a sweat in the hot Spanish sun, though some guys go out of their way, out in the heat, searching for some hot arse to blow off some steam and spray some Spanish Milk. Out in the rocky and dusty rural Spanish mountains strides a man, a sexual legend, a wild native man. Many have searched for him, trying to get the ride of their lives. The legend tells that if you meet him you'll have a wild sexual encounter, then after you blow your load he just walks off into the sunset looking for the next wandering traveler. We're off to sunny Spain.
title: Spanish Milk
